text: In Feb/Mar PHE had 'just 70 staff in its field services, 120 in local health protection teams, + 20 specially recruited clinical staff. In total, the contact tracing operation to manage the pandemic consisted of just 210 people.' China had 9000 in Wuhan. https://t.co/NqnbgPpBXy

entity.name: Covid-19: Lote com 600 litros de insumos para fabricação da Coronavac chega a SP
entity.description:
Segundo o governador de São Paulo, João Doria, a matéria-prima pode virar até 1 milhão de doses contra o coronavírus.
